A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What I want to know is who paid these \"top critics\".  The top critics are generally more harsh than I am and there is no way 92% of them gave this film a positive revue.  This move SUCKED.  Snoke was a joke\, Adam Driver should have never been hired (so hard to watch)\, Rose Tico was totally unnecessary and a horrible actress\, etc.  So many issues with this movie it's hard to know where to start.
